entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
